item.title: Vibecoding Audit
item.description: I spent the holidays building an event platform with an AI “vibecoding” tool to see if the results were actually production-ready. While the speed of development was incredible, my audit reveals the critical gaps—from database safety to broken SEO—that still need a human touch before you hit publish.
